description.sun-moon:
The user attacks the target by dancing very hard.
The user’s type determines the type of this move.

The user attacks the target by dancing very hard.

The user attacks the target by dancing very hard.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  This move's type matches the user's first type, if any; otherwise, it's typeless.
effect.shortEffect: Has the same type as the user.
